name: Formula 2707 - All Stars Kombat
description:
Formula 2707 - All Stars Kombat is a combat driving simulator inspired by the great hits of the 2000s. It recreates the classic arcade game action and offers fun without speed limits.

OLD STYLE FRIENDSHIPS

Formula 2707 offers a split-screen multiplayer* mode for those who miss long couch nights with friends.



COMBAT SIMULATOR

Formula 2707 has all the characteristics of a karting game, with the exception of the driving style which is oriented towards more simulation games.



CHOOSE YOUR CHAMPION

In Formula 2707 you can Unlock and play with the 12 All Stars Champions. There is one for every taste.



EXPLORE THE GALAXY

In Formula 2707 you will face the most diverse biomes by exploring the different planets of the various protagonists of the game, from deep space to snowy glaciers, to warm terrestrial beaches.



GAME CUSTOMIZATION

Formula 2707 allows you to customize your races to your liking, you can change: Number of Bots, Difficulty, Number of laps, Number of races, PowerUps or not.



FEATURES:
  • Variable graphics quality to support multiple devices
  • Amazing old-fashioned split-screen multiplayer for up to 4 players*
  • 12 unlockable characters
  • 9 unlockable tracks
  • 9 unlockable cars
  • 11 PowerUps
  • TimeMode : Make history by adding your name to the friends and global leaderboards

*At least one controller is needed to play split screen: Each player needs its own peripheral (Joystick or Controller or Keyboard)
